text: Boa Esperança (literally meaning "good hope" in Portuguese) may refer to the following places: ==In Brazil== * Boa Esperança, Paraná, a municipality in Paraná state * Boa Esperança, northeast of Pará, a municipality northeastern of Pará state * Boa Esperança, southwest of Pará, a town southwest of Pará state * Boa Esperança, Espírito Santo, a municipality in Espírito Santo state * Boa Esperança, Minas Gerais, a municipality in Minas Gerais state == See also == * Cape of Good Hope, Portuguese name Cabo da Boa Esperança
title: Boa Esperança
